resources.string: Update to the latest version of Galaxy Apps to enjoy new features and improvements.
"Can't check for updates. Your phone's network connection isn't stable."
"Can't check for updates. Your tablet's network connection isn't stable."
View More:Click View More:Push View More:Tap View More

"Apps that have not been used for %d days will be automatically put to sleep.
Sleeping apps will not receive updates or send you notifications, but they will wake up automatically as soon as you use them again."
You can change this option later in Battery settings.
Your phone will restart automatically within 1 hour of the time you set.
Your phone will only restart when:
Your tablet will only restart when:
Your tablet will restart automatically within 1 hour of the time you set.
"Optimize your phone automatically once a day. Background apps will be closed, but not your most recently used apps, and unnecessary files will be deleted. This won't affect your personal data."
"Your phone will only be optimized if your screen is off and your phone isn't in use. For best results, schedule optimization for a time when you don't usually use your phone."
" Your tablet will only be optimized if your screen is off and your tablet isn't in use. For best results, schedule optimization for a time when you don't usually use your tablet."
"Optimize your tablet automatically once a day. Background apps will be closed, but not your most recently used apps, and unnecessary files will be deleted. This won't affect your personal data."
"Limit battery usage for apps that you don't use often. Your phone will learn how you use apps over time."
"Limit battery usage for apps that you don't use often. Your tablet will learn how you use apps over time."
"Put this app to sleep immediately when it's not in use"
Put these apps to sleep to prevent background battery use.

It appears that your battery is old or has a reduction in performance. A reduction in battery performance can affect the battery life as well as the performance of your mobile. Please visit a Samsung service center for a battery checkup to optimize the performance of your mobile.
Please visit a Samsung service center for a battery checkup as your battery is old or is showing a significant reduction in performance.
"Set the power mode automatically based on your usage patterns to save power when it's not needed. This won't change your screen resolution."
"Set the power mode automatically based on your usage patterns to save power when it's not needed."
Power mode changed. Adaptive power saving turned off.
"Can't turn on Maximum power saving mode while %s is running."
High performance mode has been turned on.
Maximum power saving mode has been turned on.
Medium power saving mode has been turned on.
Optimized mode has been turned on.
Turning on Maximum power saving mode...
Turning on Medium power saving mode...
Experience the highest quality display with maximum brightness and screen resolution. This uses more battery.
Limit the maximum CPU speed to %d%%.
Extend your battery life to %1$s by applying the settings below.
Extend your battery life by applying the settings below.
Prevent background apps from using Wi-Fi and mobile data.
Prevent background apps from using Wi-Fi.
Maximum screen brightness and resolution. Uses more battery.
Save as much battery as possible.
Extend battery life by limiting some functions.
Get the recommended balance of performance and battery life.
Select a mode below for highest display quality or longer battery life.
Select a mode below to extend your battery life.

"Automatically adjust your settings to save battery.
The settings below will be applied at midnight if you're not using your phone. You can turn off any settings that you don't want to change."

"Automatically adjust your settings to save battery.
The settings below will be applied at midnight if you're not using your tablet. You can turn off any settings that you don't want to change."
Media volume will be limited to %d%%.
"Save battery by optimizing your settings when you're not using your phone."
"Save battery by optimizing your settings when you're not using your tablet."
"Put apps to sleep when they haven't been used for a while."
"Extend battery life by automatically putting apps to sleep when they haven't been used for a while. Tap to set the number of days."
Get notified about apps using power in the background.
"For apps that aren't used for a longer period of time, prevent them from running."
Select apps that will never be able to run in the background. These apps may not receive updates or send notifications.
"These apps won't run in the background. They may not receive updates or send notifications."
Battery:Click Battery:Push Battery:Tap Battery:Show Battery:Show me Battery:Battery Page
"Optimized mode can't be turned off because it's the default. Instead, you can select a different mode."
This function is no longer supported.
%1$s %2$s of storage space cleared. File saved.
"Can't change this setting while %s is on."
"All of this application's data will be deleted permanently. This includes all files, settings, accounts, databases etc."
Camera will be slowly alter deleted
"Device charging... Disconnect the charger to enable/disable this function."
Security information is automatically updated daily. You can also update now, then scan your phone to see if the latest update detects any new threats.
Security information is automatically updated daily. You can also update now, then scan your tablet to see if the latest update detects any new threats.
Item at position %d cannot be dragged.
"Memory usage for these apps won't be checked."
Charge your battery more quickly. Your device may become hot while using Fast cable charging. If Fast cable charging is disabled, standard charging will be used instead.
Charge your battery more quickly. You may hear a fan noise while using Fast wireless charging. If Fast wireless charging is disabled, standard wireless charging will be used instead.
McAfee and Samsung keep your phone safe by searching for malware and suspicious activity.
McAfee and Samsung keep your tablet safe by searching for malware and suspicious activity.
Clear more storage space by deleting unnecessary data, such as cached, residual, and advertisement files
Fix Now:Click Fix Now:Push Fix Now:Tap Fix Now:Fix it:Fix:Click Fix:Push Fix:Tap Fix:Fix Right Now:Fix All:Fix Them:Oh Fix:Yes Fix:Oh Fix Now:Yes Fix Now
The latest version is already installed.
Device care removed from Apps screen.
Free up space by deleting unnecessary files, zipping apps, scheduling a cleaning, and moving content to an SD card.
Clear any unnecessary files and data automatically at scheduled times.
Check on apps that are using power in the background. Put them to sleep to save battery.
"This will cause them to stop working correctly. They won't receive updates or send notifications. You can prevent this in Settings."
Samsung Cloud is syncing a large amount of data, which could reduce battery life.
Some apps or processes are overloading the system (CPU) and need to be closed.
Some apps or processes are overloading the system (CPU). Your device needs to restart.
The %s widget has been removed from your Home screen because it may cause system errors.
1 threat detected (tap here to resolve it in %s)
%1$d threats detected (tap here to resolve them in %2$s)
"Puts all of your apps to sleep to extend your battery life. Sleeping apps won't receive updates or send you notifications, but they'll wake up automatically as soon as you use them again."
Your SIM card has been changed. The previous battery policy has been disabled.

"Your SIM card has been changed. The current App power monitor settings may cause excessive battery consumption in this region.
Turn on local battery policy to put all of your apps to sleep and extend your battery life."
"Can't turn on Wireless PowerShare while connected to an external device."
"Can't turn on Wireless PowerShare while connected a call"
Charge the battery to over 30% to share power.
"Can't turn on Wireless PowerShare while using camera."
You can check the charging status in the notification panel.
If you have trouble connecting or charging is slow, remove any cover from each device.
Using this feature may affect call reception or data services, depending on your network environment.
Works with most Qi-certified devices. Different devices may charge at different speeds.
Wireless PowerShare turned off. Charge the battery to over 30% to share power again.
Wireless PowerShare turned off because the device being charged is connected to a cable charger.
Wireless PowerShare turned off. Try again when the temperature of the device being charged returns to normal.
"Wireless PowerShare turned off. Can't share power while connected to an external device."
"Wireless PowerShare turned off. You can't share power while using the camera."
Something went wrong. Try again later.
"Wireless PowerShare turned off. Try removing anything that's between the two devices, such as a case."
Wireless PowerShare turned off. Try again when your phone cools down.
Wireless PowerShare turned off. Try again when your tablet cools down.
"Wireless PowerShare turned off. Try again when the your phone's temperature returns to normal."
"Wireless PowerShare turned off. Try again when the your tablet's temperature returns to normal."
"Wireless PowerShare turned off because the device being charged isn't aligned correctly with your phone."
"Wireless PowerShare turned off because your phone's using a lot of power. Try closing some recent apps."
"Use your phone's battery to charge another device."
"Use your tablet's battery to charge another device."
"Put your phone back to back with another device. Align the other device with your phone's battery, as shown above."
Put the center of your phone back to back with another device.
Put the center of your tablet back to back with another device.
Wireless PowerShare turned off. Turn it on again to start charging.
Plan your battery consumption to meet your device usage needs
Limit the maximum charge of your battery to %d%% to protect it in conditions such as high or low temperatures, frequent charging, or keeping it connected to a charger for a long time.
"To extend the lifespan of your battery, limit the maximum charge to %1$d%%. Note that after you restart, the battery will show %2$d%% when it's charged to %3$d%%."
To turn off Protect battery, your tablet needs to restart. The battery level may not be shown correctly until your tablet has been fully charged.
To turn on Protect battery, your tablet needs to restart. The battery level may not be shown correctly until your tablet has been fully charged.
Free up memory by stopping background apps.
View Less/Click View Less/Push View Less/Tap View Less
"You've freed up %1$s %2$s of storage space since you started using Device care."
Extend your battery life by putting unused apps to Sleep.
Set a daily optimization schedule to keep your phone in shape.
Set a daily optimization schedule to keep your tablet in shape.
"Improve performance by scheduling automatic restarts when your phone's not in use."
"Improve performance by scheduling automatic restarts when your tablet's not in use."
Change the screen brightness automatically based on the surrounding light.
Keep your phone safe from malware with Security.
Keep your tablet safe from malware with Security.
Check out the apps that have been put to sleep to save battery.
"Charging works best when it's between 10° and 40°."
"Charging works best when it's between 50°F and 100°F."
"Your battery should last from 1 to 3 years, depending on usage. If you're seeing reduced battery performance or noticing battery swelling, check your phone at an authorized service center."
"Your battery should last from 1 to 3 years, depending on usage. If you're seeing reduced battery performance or noticing battery swelling, check your tablet at an authorized service center."
Extended usage in cold environments can result in temporarily reduced battery performance. Your battery will recover when it warms up again.
Extended usage in very hot environments can reduce battery performance and life.
Continuous charging over long periods can slightly reduce battery life.

"If you don't plan to use your phone for a while, we recommend charging to at least 80%, then turning off the phone and storing it at room temperature. To maintain battery performance, charge your phone at least once every 6 months."

"If you don't plan to use your tablet for a while, we recommend charging to at least 80%, then turning off the tablet and storing it at room temperature. To maintain battery performance, charge your tablet at least once every 6 months."
"If the charging port is wet, shake it off or let it dry before plugging in a charger. You can use a hair dryer on the cool setting to dry it, but don't apply heat."

A strong external shock to the device can also cause shock to the battery, which can damage the battery. In such cases, do not randomly disassemble the terminal and the battery. Be sure to repair the terminal at the authorized service center.
Find the best battery mode for your needs.
Your phone may stop working correctly because its internal storage space is full.
Your tablet may stop working correctly because its internal storage space is full.

"Tap %s to close background apps and delete unnecessary files. This won't affect your personal data."
Optimization happens automatically once a day. You can also optimize manually now or change the schedule from the More menu.
Some apps have high battery usage. Tap %s to put them to sleep.
Some apps are crashing or freezing. Tap %s to put them to sleep.
Malware apps have been detected. Tap %s to review and uninstall them.
"Tap %s to free up storage space by deleting unnecessary files. This won't affect your personal data."
Suspicious activity has been detected in some apps. Tap %s to review and uninstall them.
Samsung keeps your phone safe by searching for suspicious activity. Activate anti-malware to protect your phone.
Samsung keeps your tablet safe by searching for suspicious activity. Activate anti-malware to protect your tablet.

"Read and agree to the %1$sMcAfee End User License Agreement%2$s for using the Anti-malware solution. The Anti-malware solution won't be activated if you don't agree to the McAfee End User License Agreement."
By continuing, you agree to the %1$sMcAfee End User License Agreement%2$s and %3$sSamsung End User License Agreement%4$s.
By continuing, you agree to the %1$sSamsung End User License Agreement%2$s.
Turn on Anti-malware to protect your phone against viruses and spyware.
Turn on Anti-malware to protect your tablet against viruses and spyware.
Activate device security to protect your phone.
Activate anti-malware to protect your tablet.
Malware or suspicious activity has been detected. Uninstall these apps to protect your phone and data.
Malware or suspicious activity has been detected. Uninstall these apps to protect your tablet and data.
See award-winning products that meet your security needs.
Get special offers for ultimate protection on all your devices.
"This app has been identified as malware that could harm your phone or data. Installation isn't recommended."
"This app has been identified as malware that could harm your tablet or data. Installation isn't recommended."
Double tap to switch to calendar view.
Double tap to switch to wheel view.
Launch App Disabled Notification ignoring the number of only one time
test for memory leak intent from bartender
"test for Optimize Settings turn off screen when you tap this menu"
High battery usage detected. Tap here to resolve the issue.
Issues have been detected with some apps. Tap here to resolve them.
Security threats have been detected. Tap here to resolve them.
Test AutoReset API. It will case FC if failed.
Clear all test for battery deterioration
Trigger junk clean dialog if junk files are big
"Push fake crash data for app error test. At least one application must be installed from market."
Trigger QuickClean service to handle VOC app request. Result will be displayed here.
"Actually, Auto Optimise Delay can be set to 3, 5, 7 Days When you tap this menu, you can do test App Optimisation Feature just after 2H Only for Battery consumption test!!!"
"Test weekly report service interfaces. (These information will not be sent without End-User agreement)"
"Test weekly report service interfaces. (These information will not be sent without End-User agreement)"
Device care added to Apps screen.

"Your phone may stop working correctly because its internal storage space is full. Data loss may occur if you restart your phone.
To continue using your phone normally, uninstall apps or delete files to free up space."

"Your tablet may stop working correctly because its internal storage space is full. Data loss may occur if you restart your tablet.
To continue using your tablet normally, uninstall apps or delete files to free up space."
Internal storage space is dangerously low
Your device storage is almost full. Delete unused files or applications to free more storage space.

Unauthorized actions have been detected. Restart your phone to undo these actions.
Unauthorized actions have been detected. Restart your tablet to undo these actions.

The %s database is automatically updated every 2 weeks. You can also update now to get the latest rules for detecting unnecessary data.
%1$s %2$s of memory and %3$s %4$s of internal storage made available.
